introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text: Welcome to our Point of Sale (POS) System. We are committed to protecting your personal data in accordance with Indonesian Law No. 27 of 2022 on Personal Data Protection (UU PDP). This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information.

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUse.serviceOperation: To provide and maintain our POS services
dataUse.communication: To communicate with you about your account and orders
dataUse.analytics: To analyze and improve our services

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.text: We process your personal data based on:
legalBasis.contract: Performance of a contract with you

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.intro: We retain your personal data for different periods based on the type of data and legal requirements:
retention.activeAccounts: Active accounts: retained while account is active
retention.closedAccounts: Closed accounts: 90 days grace period for recovery
retention.guestOrders: Guest orders: 5 years (Indonesian tax law requirement)
retention.auditLogs: Audit logs: 7 years for compliance investigations

security.title: Data Security
security.intro: We implement comprehensive security measures to protect your data:
security.encryption: Encryption at rest for all personal data
security.auditTrail: Complete audit trail of all data access
security.logMasking: Automatic masking of sensitive data in logs

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Data Sharing
thirdParty.intro: We share your payment information with:
thirdParty.midtransDesc: We use Midtrans to process QRIS and other payment methods securely. Only payment-related information is shared.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.intro: Under UU PDP, you have the following rights:
yourRights.accessDesc: View all your personal data we hold
yourRights.deletionDesc: Request deletion of your personal data
yourRights.revokeDesc: Withdraw consent for optional data processing
yourRights.complaintDesc: File a complaint with data protection authorities

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: For questions about this privacy policy or to exercise your rights:
contact.responseTimeValue: Within 14 days as required by UU PDP Article 6

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.text: We may update this privacy policy periodically. Material changes will be communicated via email to registered users. The effective date at the top of this page indicates when the policy was last updated.
